actions.committee: Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to amend the definition of independent student for purposes of the need analysis in the Higher Education Act of 1965 to include older adopted students.
short_title: Fostering Adoption to Further Student Achievement Act

summary.text: Fostering Adoption to Further Student Achievement Act - Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to extend the definition of independent student, for purposes of the financial need analysis to establish student aid eligibility, to individuals who were adopted from the foster care system when they were 13 years of age or older.

titles.title: Fostering Adoption to Further Student Achievement Act
A bill to amend the definition of independent student for purposes of the need analysis in the Higher Education Act of 1965 to include older adopted students.
